node.description:
# Document Q&A

This flow loads a file and uses an LLM to answer questions based on content from the loaded document. 

## Prerequisites

* An [OpenAI API key](https://platform.openai.com/)

## Quickstart

1. Paste your OpenAI API key in the **OpenAI** model component.
2.  In the **File** component, select a file  you want to load.
3. Open the **Playground** and chat with your document.

data.description: Create a prompt template with dynamic variables.

node.description: Create a prompt template with dynamic variables.

mode.info: Choose variable syntax for your template.
mode.name: mode

template.name: template
template.value:
Answer user's questions based on the document below:

---

{Document}

---

Question:

tool_placeholder.info: A placeholder input for tool mode.
tool_placeholder.name: tool_placeholder

node.description: Runs a language model given a specified provider.

base_url_ibm_watsonx.info: The base URL of the API (IBM watsonx.ai only)
base_url_ibm_watsonx.name: base_url_ibm_watsonx

input_value.info: The input text to send to the model
input_value.name: input_value

ollama_base_url.info: Endpoint of the Ollama API (Ollama only). Defaults to http://localhost:11434
ollama_base_url.name: ollama_base_url

project_id.info: The project ID associated with the foundation model (IBM watsonx.ai only)
project_id.name: project_id

system_message.info: A system message that helps set the behavior of the assistant
system_message.name: system_message

node.description: Loads and returns the content from uploaded files.

advanced_mode.info: Enable advanced document processing and export with Docling for PDFs, images, and office documents. Note that advanced document processing can consume significant resources.
advanced_mode.name: advanced_mode

bucket_name.info: Enter the name of the S3 bucket.
bucket_name.name: bucket_name

concurrency_multithreading.info: When multiple files are being processed, the number of files to process concurrently.
concurrency_multithreading.name: concurrency_multithreading

delete_server_file_after_processing.info: If true, the Server File Path will be deleted after processing.
delete_server_file_after_processing.name: delete_server_file_after_processing

doc_key.info: The key to use for the DoclingDocument column.
doc_key.name: doc_key

file_id.info: The Google Drive file ID to read. The file must be shared with the service account email.
file_id.name: file_id

file_path.info: Data object with a 'file_path' property pointing to server file or a Message object with a path to the file. Supercedes 'Path' but supports same file types.
file_path.name: file_path

file_path_str.info: Path to the file to read. Used when component is called as a tool. If not provided, will use the uploaded file from 'path' input.
file_path_str.name: file_path_str

ignore_unspecified_files.info: If true, Data with no 'file_path' property will be ignored.
ignore_unspecified_files.name: ignore_unspecified_files

ignore_unsupported_extensions.info: If true, files with unsupported extensions will not be processed.
ignore_unsupported_extensions.name: ignore_unsupported_extensions

markdown.info: Export processed documents to Markdown format. Only available when advanced mode is enabled.
markdown.name: markdown

md_image_placeholder.info: Specify the image placeholder for markdown exports.
md_image_placeholder.name: md_image_placeholder

md_page_break_placeholder.info: Add this placeholder between pages in the markdown output.
md_page_break_placeholder.name: md_page_break_placeholder

ocr_engine.info: OCR engine to use. Only available when pipeline is set to 'standard'.
ocr_engine.name: ocr_engine

path.info: Supported file extensions: csv, json, pdf, txt, md, mdx, yaml, yml, xml, html, htm, docx, py, sh, sql, js, ts, tsx, adoc, asciidoc, asc, bmp, dotx, dotm, docm, jpg, jpeg, png, potx, ppsx, pptm, potm, ppsm, pptx, tiff, xls, xlsx, xhtml, webp; optionally bundled in file extensions: zip, tar, tgz, bz2, gz
path.name: path

s3_file_key.info: The key (path) of the file in S3 bucket.
s3_file_key.name: s3_file_key

separator.info: Specify the separator to use between multiple outputs in Message format.
separator.name: separator

service_account_key.info: Your Google Cloud Platform service account JSON key as a secret string (complete JSON content).
service_account_key.name: service_account_key

silent_errors.info: If true, errors will not raise an exception.
silent_errors.name: silent_errors

storage_location.info: Choose where to read the file from.
storage_location.name: storage_location

use_multithreading.info: Set 'Processing Concurrency' greater than 1 to enable multithreading.
use_multithreading.name: use_multithreading

description: Integrates PDF reading with a language model to answer document-specific questions. Ideal for small-scale texts, it facilitates direct queries with immediate insights.
name: Document Q&A
